data.name: Kingdom Two Crowns: OST
data.detailed_description:
Kingdom Two Crowns Original Soundtrack contains the beautiful music composed by Amos Roddy and the Norse Lands soundtrack composed by Kalandra.

data.short_description: Kingdom Two Crowns Original Soundtrack contains the beautiful music composed by Amos Roddy and the Norse Lands soundtrack composed by Kalandra.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, French, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel 4th Gen Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTX Series 8
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel 5th Gen
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.0.4.
  • Processor: Intel 4th Gen Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTX Series 8
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
